about.heroSubtitle: The legacy of excellence in the art of classic barbering.
about.legacyParagraph1: Founded on the principles of artisanal tradition, Barber Sosa was born from the desire to revive the golden age of barbering. We do not merely cut hair; we sculpt identities.
about.legacyParagraph2: Every cut is a testament to our passion for detail and respect for classic techniques inherited from master barbers, fused with the contemporary style of the modern gentleman. From traditional straight razors to cutting-edge grooming products, we guarantee an unparalleled luxury experience.
about.quote: Barbering is not simply a trade; it is the sacred art of refining a man's presence.
about.valuesTraditionBody: We honor old-school techniques where patience and precision were the supreme law.
about.valuesStyleBody: Every gentleman is unique; we design cuts that enhance his personality and royal distinction.
about.valuesQualityBody: We use premium products and precision tools for an impeccable, long-lasting finish.
about.headTitle: About Us - Barber Sosa Royal Style

politicas.title: Policies and Terms
politicas.metaDescription: Data treatment, payments, shipping and service scope policies for Sosa Barber. Service available in Colombia only.
politicas.scopeBody: This application and Sosa Barber services (bookings, online store and payments) are intended exclusively for users located in the Republic of Colombia. We do not offer service or process transactions for users outside Colombian territory. By using this site, you declare that you are in Colombia and accept that the commercial relationship is governed by Colombian law.
politicas.dataIntro: In compliance with Law 1581 of 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013 (Colombia), we inform you that the personal data you provide (name, email, phone, booking or purchase data) will be used only for:
politicas.dataItem2: Processing store orders and communications related to your purchase.
politicas.dataItem3: Sending information about your account or the service when necessary.
politicas.dataItem4: Complying with legal or regulatory obligations when applicable.
politicas.dataOutro: We do not sell or share your data with third parties for commercial purposes. You may exercise your rights to know, update, correct and delete your data, as well as revoke authorization, by contacting us through the channels indicated on this page.
politicas.paymentsBody: Online store payments are processed securely through Mercado Pago. Prices shown are those in effect at the time of purchase. By confirming payment, you accept the total amount indicated. For appointment bookings, payment may be made at the barbershop as agreed.
politicas.paymentsCurrency: Amounts may be expressed in Colombian pesos (COP) or in the currency indicated by the payment platform according to its configuration.
politicas.shippingBody: We do not currently offer home delivery. Store orders are for pickup at our location or to be arranged directly with us. This may change in the future; if so, this policy will be updated.
politicas.bookingsBody: Bookings made through this platform are subject to availability. We reserve the right to reschedule or cancel in cases of force majeure. Payment for barbering services may be made at the establishment according to the options we offer.
politicas.contactBody: To exercise your rights regarding your personal data, inquiries about these policies or complaints, you may contact us through the channels published on our site (email, social media or location). We reserve the right to modify these policies; changes will be published on this page with the date of last update. Continued use of the site after such changes implies acceptance of the new terms.
